tool_description: Rakaptcha: Encoded Captcha API  Rakaptcha is a powerful and user-friendly Encoded Captcha API designed to protect online applications and services from automated bots and malicious activities. With its robust security features and easy integration, Rakaptcha provides a reliable solution for ensuring user authenticity and data integrity.
name: RaKaptcha
title: RaKaptcha

api_list.name: GET
api_list.description: Use this to get your captcha image and text in json format with other info.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rakaptcha.p.rapidapi.com/ApiUse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rakaptcha.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rakaptcha.p.rapidapi.com/ApiUse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rakaptcha.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
